name: Little Space (Xasu)
description:
Shoot the incoming Asteroids with your Spaceship in order to survive. But be carefull, the lasers get reflected by the walls! Dont get shot by yourself!

Its just a little Minigame I made a while ago with the Unreal Engine 4 and now decided to publish it. 

Controls:

Move: WASD

Aiming and Ship rotation: Mouse 

Fire: Left Click

Pause: Escape
